<template>
    <el-row
          type="flex"
          justify="space-around"
          align="center"
          class="blog-header--row"
        >
          <el-col :span="4">
            <el-image
              style="width: 80px; height: 80px"
              :src="require('@/assets/img/xiangcai.png')"
              fit="cover"
            ></el-image>
          </el-col>
          <el-col :span="14" class="hidden-xs-only">
            <!-- <el-menu mode="horizontal" active-text-color="#fff" background-color="#222"> -->
            <el-menu mode="horizontal" router active-text-color="#409EFF" default-active="/">
              <el-menu-item index="/">主页</el-menu-item>
              <el-menu-item index="/column">分类</el-menu-item>
              <el-menu-item index="/article/list">文章列表</el-menu-item>
              <el-menu-item index="/photo">相册</el-menu-item>
              <el-menu-item index="/article">其他</el-menu-item>
            </el-menu>
          </el-col>
          <component :is="isUser"></component>
        </el-row>
</template>

<script>
import NormalUser from "@/components/user/NormalUser";
import UserAvatar from "@/components/user/UserAvatar";
export default {
  components: {
    NormalUser,
    UserAvatar,
  },
  data() {
    return {
      
    };
  },
  computed: {
    isUser() {
      return this.$store.state.token ? "UserAvatar" : "NormalUser";
    },
  },
  mounted() {
    
  },

  methods: {
    
  },
};
</script>

<style lang="stylus">
  ul.el-menu
    display: flex
    justify-content: flex-start
    & li
      width: 15%
      font-size 16px
  div.el-image>img
   border-radius: 50%
</style>
